snippet: The Mets scored four runs in the seventh inning and, for the second night in a row, staged a late rally to defeat the Phillies.
abstract: New York Mets defeat Philadelphia Phillies, 7-4.
lead_paragraph: The Mets scored four runs in the seventh inning and, for the second night in a row, staged a late rally to defeat the Phillies.

headline.seo: Mets’ Late Rally Beats Phillies Again
headline.main: Mets Turn Tables and Take Advantage of the Phillies’ Beleaguered Bullpen
headline.print_headline: Mets Turn Tables and Take Advantage of the Phillies’ Beleaguered Bullpen
